attributes.action: family courts to use real evidence other than here say to remove a child
attributes.additional_details: To change the system giving parents a fair chance under there human rights. I think if a child is removed for neglect/serious harm.then there should be physical evidence as this is a serious matter. Video evidence is real evidence.Written reports from social workers who do get things wrong should be held accountable for there actions. Judges should have time to see evidence as this is people life’s.
attributes.background: Many children are removed into the care system from written criminology reports from social workers.I think this should be changed to video evidence other than written reports like the police I think social worker should have body cameras the evidence to remove a child on what written is not a law.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Body cameras for all social workers to enhance accountability
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733209

Review the family court system for removing children from their guardian
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733515
